Issue.summary: Verification of multisig over state-proof by clients.
Issue.description: POA:Sovrin client fetches the last anchored record of the pool ledger before the state proof. It takes the anchor record, and then gets (each client has the same pool ledger as nodes) the node verification keys corresponding to the root hash in the anchored record. Once it has the correct verification keys, it verifies the state proof
